ComicInfo.Summary:
The team that answered to no one is back...but altogether different!
Aspen's popular mash-up of supernatural characters returns for a thrilling second volume! Doc Blue discovers he might be the key to The Four Point continued existence as a group-a discovery he may not survive! Meanwhile, Gia reveals to the group her knowledge of an extraterrestrial element that could spell doom for all of them! Plus, the return of a popular Aspen Comics character!
Written by legendary Uncanny X-Men scribe Scott Lobdell (The Four Points), along with acclaimed Arena Mode Saga writer Blake Northcott (Michael Turner's Fathom), with art by Giuseppe Cafaro (Michael Turner's Soulfire), this is THE NEW Aspen title you won't want to miss!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Edition A | Chahine Ladjouze | 1 | B | Direct Market Edition B | Alex Arizmendi | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Chahine Ladjouze | 3 |
